00811     class SynchronizationError :public ReactorException {
00812     public:
00818       SynchronizationError(TeleoReactor const &r, std::string const &msg) throw()
00819        :ReactorException(r, msg) {}

00832     class DispatchError :public ReactorException {
00833     public:
00839       DispatchError(TeleoReactor const &r, goal_id const &g, std::string const &msg) throw()
00840        :ReactorException(r, buil_msg(g, msg)) {}
00842       ~DispatchError() throw() {}
00843       
00844     private:
